Private Sub SortArrayByAlphabet(aString() as String)
  Dim MadeChange As Boolean
  Dim tString as String
  Dim i as Long
  
  MadeChange = True
  While MadeChange = True
      MadeChange = False
      For i = LBound(aString) To UBound(aString) - 1
          If StrComp(aString(i), aString(i + 1)) = 1 Then
              tString = aString(i)
              aString(i) = aString(i + 1)
              aString(i + 1) = tmpName
              MadeChange = True
          End If
      Next i
  Wend
End Sub
